rev.comment: This media use does not comply with [[WP:NFCC]] #10c and MUST be removed until it does. Thank you.

[[Image:Monk title card.png|thumb|400px|right|The ''[[Monk (TV series)|Monk]]'' title card for seasons 2-8.]]
  â  
The following is a complete '''episode list''' for the [[criminal]] [[Comedy-drama|dramedy]] [[television series]], '''''[[Monk (TV series)|Monk]]'''''. It premiered on [[USA Network]] July 12, 2002 in the [[United States]] and ended with a two-part series finale on November 27 and December 4, 2009. The complete series has a total of 125 episodes, including three 2-part episodes and four [[Christmas]] specials.
